# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

Currently, the following versions of School Management System are receiving security updates:

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| v0.0.1  | ✅ Yes             |
| < v0.0.1| ❌ No              |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

We take the security of School Management System seriously. If you believe you have found a security vulnerability, please report it to us responsibly.

**Please do not report security vulnerabilities via public GitHub issues.**

### How to Report

Please send an email to **security@example.com**.

Include the following information in your report:
- Type of issue (e.g., buffer overflow, SQL injection, cross-site scripting)
- Full paths of source file(s) related to the manifestation of the issue
- The location of the affected code (tag/branch/commit or direct URL)
- Any special configuration required to reproduce the issue
- Step-by-step instructions to reproduce the issue
- Proof-of-concept or exploit code (if possible)
- Impact of the issue, including how an attacker might exploit it

### What to Expect

- You will receive an acknowledgment email within 48 hours.
- We will provide a preliminary assessment of the issue within 5 business days.
- We will handle the vulnerability according to our internal security process.
- We will keep you informed of our progress.
- We will provide you with a timeline for the fix.
- We will credit you for your discovery in our security advisories (unless you prefer to remain anonymous).

Thank you for helping keep School Management System secure!
